a.n: Jacques Kuba Séguin: L'étude des Lueurs

p.k: Jacques Kuba Séguin: L'étude des Lueurs 2016. Jacques Kuba Séguin. Salle l'Astral, Montreal, Canada
p.d: Trumpeter Jacques Kuba Séguin's ensemble unites some of Montreal's most expressive musicians: apart from Jacques Kuba Séguin, double bassist Frédéric Alarie, pianist Jonathan Cayer, and drummer Kevin Warren deliver subtle but strong lyrical moments, that make it hard not to be touched by the musical bond of this group. The experience of their 'Litania Projekt' seems to stop time for an instant. Together with his expressive musicians, Jacques presents a program that swings between modernity and tradition.
